response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its unique features and the value it brings, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $7,500. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider this investment in yourself and your future. If you're interested or have any questions, please let me know. I'm here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 7500}
